name: Enter Falconry
description: Enter Falconry immerses you in the captivating world of Arabian falconry, where dedicated falconers train and nurture their majestic birds of prey. Forge strong bonds with your avian companions, train them diligently, expand your collection, compete, and connect with the world's foremost trainers.

name: Dream Fish
description: This is a simple game!

name: Spirit Possession
description: A 2D horizontal platform game that transforms into an enemy and solves puzzles.

name: Glue 10
description: Create and control physics-based vehicles and structures with total freedom to win the Glutenberg challenges.

name: Panda: Eats, Shoots and Leaves
description: Become a spunky panda in this VR panda paradise! Run, jump, and climb only using your hands and engage in lively mud gun battles. Connect with fellow pandas in this whimsical, action-filled escapade!

name: Silicon War: Blitz
description: In "Silicon War:Blitz" ,you will pilot your mech through an onslaught of endless bullets and enemies! Each battle is a crucial test of your reaction skills and strategic planning. Continuously upgrade and enhance your mech until all adversaries are vanquished!

name: Blocks!
description: BLOCKS! is a virtual sandbox that lets you create anything you can imagine - in immersive, user-generated 3D worlds. There aren't any predefined aims or goals.

name: Syke
description: Syke is a first-person exploratory puzzle game set in a mysterious and beautifully warped reality. You play as an individual making their way through areas of strange geometry; solving puzzles to piece together the story of their love.

name: Event World VR
description: Your #1 venue for performances and shows! This game is a way to submerge yourself metaversally in the full musical and theatrical experience. Event VR is holding a multitude of different shows and concerts. This game also will allow you to go to shows with your friends and play mini rogue games.

name: The Twisting Trail of Clues
description: The Twisting Trail of Clues is a captivating and thrilling modern-day murder mystery. Set in a bustling city, the story follows detective Emma as she tries to solve a seemingly impossible case - the murder of a prominent businessman by a mysterious secret society.

name: Impractical Spells
description: The rules of the game are simple. Pick cards to get stronger. Be the last wizard standing to win, Win 8 rounds to win the game.

name: Quantum Beast
description: Quantum Beast is a hardcore sci-fi stylish action fighting game where you need to execute massive crazy robots to save the city. Be sure fully acquiring various skills to pass through those hard battles.

name: Primeval Horizon
description: Start your own journey in a primeval open world, facing survival challenges alongside other inhabitants as you strive to thrive and evolve, conquering bosses and augmenting your creature along the way.

name: Owner
description: A RPG adventure game where society, economy, philosophy and politics mix in a fun and ironic way, forcing the player to take tough decisions that challenge morality and affect the game ending.

name: Battle Royale with Cheese
description: "Battle Royale with Cheese": a modern battlefield, 20 teams of three, and pure strategic mayhem. Scavenge for weapons and stay stocked on supplies. Victory belongs to the boldest squads.

name: Dr. Planet
description: Create mini planets and civilizations. Let them flourish, or let them fall - literally. The choice is yours, Doctor Planet.

name: Hope Timbre
description: Solve puzzles using insect-like traversal skills through imaginary realm, in which there is no up or down. Guide mysterious creature, manipulate the architecture and find hope instruments. After you wake up, use them to heal the world and escape never-ending cycle!

name: Izolated
description:
iZolated is a post-apocalyptic world with procedurally generated locations affected by the Spoils, where in order to survive you have to create food, equipment, weapons and even build your own shelter from improvised items!

Travel through the procedurally generated forest, get resources, explore new locations, evolve to get out of the forest enveloped by the spoil.

name: Revenge Request
description: Revenge Request is a Tactical, FPS, Roguelite set in a modern day world. Pick from multiple different classes with their own unique weapons and abilities. Combine skill and equipment in various ways to experience diverse gameplay.

name: Stories to Tell: Downhill Cemetery
description: In "Stories to tell - Downhill Cemetery" you are a young Japanese man named Hiroshi who decided to move to a new house, he did not know what awaited him...

name: Deck Remover
description: There are many different decks. And your goal is to draw all the cards in that deck. It's a game of 70% luck, 5% skill, and 25% doubt. A card will tell you what the 25% doubt is.

name: Escape Room Collection C1
description: This is a collection of Escape Rooms games. In these games, you will be locked in a room and have to find clues and solve puzzles to escape . Each game offers a unique and challenging experience, Only the most clever and resourceful players will succeed in these thrilling Escape Room challenges.

name: A Slightly Different Backrooms
description: A slightly different Backrooms is a Coop or Singleplayer Horror Puzzle Game. Encounter different Monsters and Levels than in the other Backrooms, but brace yourself for the same bone-chilling atmosphere like the typical ones.

name: Primavera Lihbor
description: Primavera LIHBOR is a story-driven, first-person 3d adventure focused on exploration and riddle solving with occasional encounters with hostile entities from other worlds.

name: Mission: Rift Seeker
description: Mission: Rift seeker is a colony simulation game about building and managing your base on an unknown planet and exploring the surrounding void rifts that are full of horrific and mysterious entities that you are tasked to capture before they to eat the brave and fluffy seekers that you command.

name: WWII Squad Level Land Battles ssp
description: A Wargame for Grognards, its a little bit complicated for the average user. it is chits representing the units . the combat is decided by dice rolls and modifiers. It is 2D topdown. with a fantastic A.I.

name: Stig
description: A sokoban-style puzzle game about finding a path through colors

name: Stock: Retail investors
description: Master a simulated economy and stock market as an investor. Manage assets, debt, and risks to strategize investments amidst market fluctuations. Achieve success through smart risk-taking and financial planning.

name: 4.1.60Co
description: Cobalt 60 of April 1 is a magical text-based adventure game in which players play Anton Andreevich Sidorov, the protagonist of the Soviet Union in the 1960s. - My name is Anton, the name of the man who helped me is Anton, and the name of the man who tried to kill me is Anton, so who am I?

name: Soulrise
description: Soulrise is a challenging precision platformer that can be played alone or with up to three friends. As you climb a tower, you determine the angle and power of your jumps. Be careful... One mistake and your progress is set back by an unpleasant fall!

name: Simulation Training Room: Massacre
description: Connect to the virtual world to kill zombies, gain experience and level up. Increase level and allocate skill points.

name: Greatest Dungeon
description: Soulslike PvPvE medieval Dungeon-crawler, with extraction possibility and incoming zone. The Combat is Physicbased and has dismemberment, higher speed-stats of yours slowdown enemy's, and projectiles, you can find rare Items or NPCs in the Dungeon that give you Quests or fight Bosses.

name: Don't Exist
description: In this experimental horror wander the endless procedurally generated mall and encounter the strange and unique entities that inhabit it. Death is your best guide in learning how to exist in this place.

name: Rouge Tank
description: 2D Tank Bullet Hell with powerups, and endless enemies. Play for your personal Highscore

name: Sunset Devils
description: Sunset Devils is a top-down action shooter, Where every weapon's unique controls must be mastered through the thrill of an old west gunfight. A classic spaghetti western story of vengeance, portrayed in stylish pixel art.

name: Too Far Too Late
description: Embark on a Colony in Space. Build a base to ensure your colonists survive. Explore, mine resources, craft items, and thrive in a realistic atmospheric and electrical simulation. Watch out for potential dangers before it’s too late!

name: Stealth Gun
description: A fun shooter where EVERYONE IS INVISIBLE by default! Use various mechanics to locate other players, and play different game modes with your friends or in public lobbies.

name: Animal Way
description: Animal Way is a topdown, cozy farm-like simulation game. Explore a serene island, craft and build, make the island yours.

name: Monkey Forward
description: Race through cherry tree seasons as a speedy monkey collecting honey and dodging obstacles in this thrilling endless run game but with advanced gameplay.

name: Shapefall
description: Engage in a unique cooperative FPS with up to three allies. Defend against endless enemies by utilizing weapons that fire 3D shapes. Match ammo shapes and colors to maximize damage and unlock perks. Explore ruins, solve puzzles, and discover easter eggs to enhance your strategic play.

name: Whispers in the Shadows
description: A Horror game, where you use your torch to fend off the monsters created in your own head, and discover the secrets hidden within the forest.

name: Halloween Experience 3: GGen
description: A short spooky game filled with suprises and references made by a solo dev. You might think it's almost a parody, and you could be right.

name: Block Man Adventures
description: This is a game that you are meant to rage at and try your best at with ten unique levels personally designed by me to tort... Make sure the payer has the most enjoyable time possible. I wish all changers luck and have fun.

name: Power Quest Survivors
description: Power Quest Survivors is a challenging bullet hell game where players face relentless waves of enemies. Through strategic gameplay and skillful evasion, players earn experience points to unlock new abilities, enhancing their chances of survival in this unforgiving fantasy world

name: Heroes For Hire
description: You've joined a guild before, right? So, where's the trouble in managing a guild of your own, too? Guide your heroes, raid some dungeons, and grow your guild to rise from the bottom of the ranks right up to the top in Heroes for Hire!

name: Fairytale Furnishing
description: Enjoy decorating fairytale homes in this small, cozy game, suitable for those who love interior design and a fairy-tale atmosphere. Meet unique characters and explore a playful narrative. No rush, no hard tasks—just pure relaxation with a touch of magic and Wi-Fi.

name: Cats vs. Aliens
description: Aliens have come to The Planet! Fight, gather, build, recruit, and conquer in this casually fresh take on familiar base building and bullet heaven mechanics. WARNING: Animal pun quantity may exceed the daily recommended limit.

name: Summoner's Sky
description: Get ready to embark on an adventure across the floating islands! Accompanied by your trusty Summon Book, you can battle monsters great and small with your own. The fate of the world is in your hands.

name: Press Any Key
description: Just press any key.

name: Reversi xVSx
description: Playtest release From Japan Time 2024/ 3/ 29 5:30 to 2024/ 4/ 15 23:59. It is set to open signup, so you can join without approval. There is no obligation to report bugs. REVERSI xVSx is a party game where 1 to 10 people can play Reversi. You can play CPU battle or up to 5 vs 5 online matches

name: Baa! Never Stop Bleating
description: Baa! Get ready for an exhilarating Roguelike adventure! Whether you go solo or invite your friends, use randomly generated objects to construct a sturdy home to shield your little ones from the dangers in the forest. Start building your family now and prove the power of the sheep! Baa!

name: Conquest of Kings
description: Dive into fast-paced, deep-level turn-based strategy! Compete for Sacred Sites, recruit units, play powerful cards, conquer strategic tiles, and forge alliances with cunning diplomacy... only to shatter them when necessary - for in this realm, only one can claim the throne!

name: Tumble Ball
description: Tumble Ball is a 3D-cubic maze solver with a simple goal; find the exit. Navigate complicated labyrinths in various shapes and sizes, and compete with people from all over the world, for your place on the leaderboards.

name: Solar Kingdoms: Human Survival
description: Solar Kingdoms is a real-time strategy game where you command forces across solar systems, engaging in large battles both in space and on the surfaces planets. Establish colonies, find resources and artifacts, and fight up to 8 factions in skirmish, large campaign, missions, and multiplayer.

name: Girl's Memories
description: "Girl's Memories," an enchanting PC game that invites you into a world of captivating beauty and thrilling adventure! Immerse yourself in stunning artwork meticulously crafted by renowned artists, bringing to life a diverse cast of mesmerizing characters.

name: Platform 8
description: You are trapped on a train that runs forever. Keep an eye out for anomalies and find a way out.

name: Duckified: Cosmic Legends
description: Duckified: Cosmic Legends is meant to be a fast paced game all about the multiverse, with a whole lot of ducks!

name: Blue Eyes
description: This game is easy and fun,

name: Elevator Warp
description: Your goal is simple. Take the elevator to floor 6. But this is no ordinary elevator... Who knows which random floor you'll end up at. A hotel, dungeon, hedge maze, a train? Check the clues on each floor to be able to progress, and achieve the perfect run!

name: Eldorado FPS
description: Eldorado FPS: A thrilling FPS adventure with diverse modes - Deathmatch, Team Deathmatch, Capture the Flag, Gun Mode, and Zombie Survival. Customize load-outs, compete globally, and rise in the ranks. Intense action, strategy, and endless fun await!

name: Polygon Hell 4D
description: You've been trapped in a Non-Euclidean reality, and the only way out is to go on a brutal massacre. Gear up, and get ready to lose your sanity in this disorienting action-packed shooter!

name: UFO Taxi
description: Explore the City and what's under it, Complete traditional taxi missions or Special side missions for citizens in this 2.5d hovering platformer game.

name: Ivorfall
description: Ivorfall City is in danger and only you have what it takes to save it! Ivorfall is a Steampunk, roguelike, twin-stick shooter where you take up the mantle of Detective Flintlock who must face off against hordes of enemies in destructible environments.

name: Parallels: Year One
description: Parallels: Year One is a visual novel that will take you on a journey through one relationship in five parallel worlds. Join Ron and Jessica on a journey to see each other from a new perspective.

name: Swordsman
description: This is a casual game with action gameplay designed to be highly consistent with the name

name: Vuntra City
description: An immersive city exploration game where every building can be entered. Explore a vast procedural city, meet its inhabitants, and gain access to exclusive locations with breathtaking views.

name: Dot Piece Puzzle: Dotpicture
description: Combine Dot Pieces to complete Puzzles!Solve puzzles featuring adorable pixel art of animals, food, and more.Collect all the cute pixel art puzzles!

name: Scary In The Journey
description: Scary In is a Co-op Horror game, set in the post-apocalyptic future due to radiation called Solar, and you have to live in underground station where it connect to all the world station. Travel with friends, many solar entity lurking around, and you have to solve puzzle, Start your journey now!

name: Game is Full of Bugs
description: Game is Full of Bugs is a game about a crafty programmer fighting an alien invasion of bugs by building a magazine of bullets like a deck of cards.

name: Sandtable Engine
description: Welcome to the sandbox world full of creativity! With a free and open gameplay mode and a creative platform, whether you are a player or a developer, you can find highly scalable gameplay and game modes, or DIY your own game ideas here!

name: Snail Juice
description: Reminiscent of Abe's Odyssey and Rayman. Journey through challenging levels to rescue snail friends trapped in a juice factory, facing off against relentless robots and security guards. Trade lives for cash, equip yourself with bombs and ammunition to conquer obstacles and snack on junk food.

name: Joe Maverick: Legend of the Savior
description: Venture into medieval times to fulfil an ancient prophecy! Featuring a well-crafted world, a zany cast of characters, and turn-based combat, gather your wits to uncover the truth behind the world you explore in this JRPG adventure.

name: Monster United
description: This is a casual auto-battler game where you need to build your monster legion as you climb the tower! Random levels, rich alliances, and an equipment talent system provide countless possibilities for gameplay strategies, offering both casual relaxation and strategic depth!

name: Wild in the West
description: Outcast by a frontier town, a mysterious gunslinger becomes their last hope against a ruthless robot invasion. Bullets fly, and gears grind in this epic Wild West vs. sci-fi showdown. Will classic grit prevail?

name: Echoes of Elysium
description: An aerial exploration and survival game, set in the procedural world of Elysium. Fire up the engines and take to the skies in your hand-crafted fleet of airships. Mechanical wonders clash with ancient mysteries in an untamed paradise.

name: State of Matter
description: State of Matter is an FPS puzzler where the player is an intergalactic agent tasked with delving into an abandoned facility on a frozen asteroid. With the help of a gun that can blast matter in various states, the player must solve puzzles and defeat enemies to explore deeper into the facility.

name: Gunstorm II
description: Gunstorm II is an space-shooter with bags of playability, character, pretty weapons, and lots of fun. The plot-based action takes you to five different worlds, in a perfectly balanced game that starts easy and gradually gets more difficult.

name: Desvelado
description: Turn off the lights, dodge the ghosts and go to sleep as soon as you can in this hand-crafted 2d platform experience! In this vampiric precision platformer you will overcome challenging puzzles and deadly enemies before going to sleep in your cosy coffin.

name: Doppel Diner
description: In an alternate 1950s universe, there is a small spaceship diner, where the position of the orbit determines its interior environment. Explore three distinct gameplay challenges that metaphorically represent the real euthymic, manic, and depressive mood episodes of bipolar disorder.

name: Innsmouth 22
description: In this visual novel the main character, Lorenzo Righi, an Italian Professor, is invited to a meeting of History Scholars held in Boston. Excited and flattered by the invitation, he discovers that something else, hidden and mysterious, awaits for him.

name: Batiman
description: Indie game for kids and adults.

name: SpongeBob's Truth or Square
description: The PSP version of SpongeBob’s Truth Or Square has a slightly different story, 2 exclusive levels that were also in the DS version, among other things.

name: SoulShake
description: After waking up, you will find a way to escape from an abandoned hospital in the basement and figure out what happened.

name: Heart and Core
description: A twin-stick action brawler. Young engineer JJ and her robot companion, KAI, evade the totalitarian control of the ruthless Santiago. Traverse, hide, and fight your way through a seemingly unending onslaught of enemy RAMs. Use JJ’s Gravity Gun and KAI’s fists to stun and destroy enemies.

name: Hen Town
description: Hen Town is a rogue-like game, you are a female knight battles monsters, protects village restoring light and hope.

name: Alchemy Frogs
description: Alchemy Frogs is a local co-op puzzle platformer game with a 3D, isometric camera, in which Frog & Toad traverse a poisoned swamp to look for a cure that will help them save their family from being turned to stone. Frog & Toad will mix their potions to unleash powerful magical effects.

name: Bbosong
description: The game starts when the player presses the door. Move using the left and right arrow keys. To exit, press the exit button on the main scene. There are no save points and if you fail you have to play from the beginning. There are up to 4 stages.

name: Unihorn
description: Cute, funny and with one horn - that is an Unihorn. Welcome to the very first unicorn climbing game!

name: Easy Breezy Drive
description: Crank the tunes, and hit the open road in Easy Breezy Drive! This relaxing driving experience lets you cruise endless roads behind the wheel of your pickup truck. No objectives, no pressure, just you, your tunes, the endless roads, and enough scenery to make your eyeballs happy.

name: Lich's Dungeon
description: Lich's Dungeon is an autobattler roguelike RPG, buy and upgrade skills, find synergies and use powerful items in your quest to defeat the undying lich.

name: One Last Dinner
description: You are a famous detective. Examine the evidence around you, read the notes left for you and listen to audio recordings, follow clues, write down your findings, interrogate suspects. How would you like to be the shining star of the scene?

name: Warfare Ultimatum
description: Modern FPS/RTS hybrid, Large-scale battles from the depth of the sea all the way to space! Either play the standard 64-player non-stop battle using Air/Land/Sea vehicles or drop in a thriller, long game of Diplomacy Warfare, experience sabotage, betrayal, war crime, organized operations and more

name: RetroSpace
description: Drive through futuristic maps on distant planets. Enjoy the endless drive on different planets while listening to retro music!

name: Failure to Launch
description: Failure to Launch is a short physics based platformer where you must reach space with a small space capsule.

name: G9: League of Aces
description: In G9: League of Aces, heroes have personalized skills, allowing players to choose combinations based on preference. Three modes offer diverse gameplay: 5 vs 5, A.R.A.M., and the original Crazy Carnival Battle Park. From high-tech enhanced heroes to superhumans and aliens, all compete for glory!

name: One Socket
description: Charge the generator to power your devices, but be careful, you only have One Socket to work with. Make tough decisions to keep you safe from the monster in the dark while you solve the mysteries that will free you. Do you have what it takes to survive?

name: Blast in the Past
description: Blast through 28 levels in this FPS inspired by classic retro games. Levels span across 3 game modes ending with unique epic boss battles to test your skills. Find hidden medals, discover hidden objectives, and level up your character all while trying to survive an onslaught of nostalgic foes.

name: Lumos
description: Galactic Labyrinth = Navigating Planetary Portals"

name: Catlists
description: The word-based, multiplayer, party game that doesn't require internet!

name: Hypnomemoria
description: Oliver got a chance to receive therapy in one of the greatest psychiatric clinics. However, for that he’ll have to try a new experimental type of treatment. Will that therapy heal him or leave a bigger wound?

name: Pup Champs
description: A tactical puzzle game about leading a football team of cute dogs! Solve puzzles, score goals and become the champions!

name: Everwayne
description: Embark on a journey through the fading world of Everwane, unravel all of its secrets, untangle the personal stories of characters, collect various unique cards for each character, and battle your enemies.

name: Falling Stars... And Other Celestial Objects
description: Design the perfect defence system for the city in this physics-based game. Stop the falling celestial objects with turrets, fire, lightning, portals and more! 60+ levels that will challenge your ingenuity and creativity.

name: Lost Meow
description: In the winter city, a cute cat fights for survival, begging for food from pedestrians and warming itself on manhole covers. Avoid dangers like passing cars, hostile dogs, and unfriendly pedestrians. Help the kitty get home in this captivating arcade!

name: Sociopat
description: Sociopat is an absurd comedy driven game that combines point and click adventure with action packed FPS game. Play in a role of an anti-hero and do some mischievous acts, NOW!

name: SpongeBob's Truth or Square
description: In the DS version of SpongeBob’s Truth Or Square, all attacks are available from the beginning, and there are some exclusive gameplay modes and minigames, plus 2 additional levels that were also seen in the PSP version.

name: Disgaea 7: Koremade no Zenbu Iri Hajimemashita
description: A complete edition of Disgaea 7: Vows of the Virtueless containing all existing downloadable content and bonus items, plus a new bonus story, new characters, and new post-game elements.

name: ElePaperAction
description: Sin descripción

name: Drago Adventure
description: Play the Drago Adventure game to join a little magical dragon on a big quest! Explore 7 worlds, fight enemies, and use amazing powers to save the day!

name: Boidtrancer
description: Sin descripción

name: Isuta no Usagi
description: A little jump and run puzzle game with some additional mini games within! The standalone release of the Geotastic Easter Egg Hunt game within a game. Can you find all 19 secrets? Enjoy this little platform er with handmade graphical assets and an original soundtrack.

name: Fortress Duty
description:
A bone-chilling experience based on Team Fortress 2 and inspired by the I'm on Observation Duty game series.
Search for and fix anomalies on familiar maps. Pay attention to every detail, and try not to look into the eyes of those who shouldn't be there. Survive until 6 AM.

name: My Neighbor Enide
description:
Allie hasn't had the easiest life, but she makes the best of it. There's still plenty to appreciate, like living down by the beach, having a dad that loves you, and being across the street from the best neighbor on the block.

My Neighbor Enide is a short light horror-themed RPG game. This game is dialogue heavy, and plays out more like a visual novel with light RPG elements.

The game takes about 40 minutes to 1 hour to complete. There are two endings: One normal ending and one true ending.

name: Hobo 5: Space Brawls - Attack of the Hobo Clones
description: Hobo has been abducted by aliens and finds himself on a UFO in deep space. Aliens have used his DNA to clone him and are in the process of making a hobo army. They also drained Hobo of all of his combo moves, so he has to fight aliens and hobo clones to get them back!

name: Hobo 6: Hell
description: Our dearest Hobo has died and gone to hell! He now needs to face hordes of demons and their master Satan. This should be all in a day's work for Hobo!

name: Hobo 7: Heaven
description: The seventh and final epic episode of the Hobo series! Hobo finds himself unwelcome in Heaven after defeating Satan. Now he has an appointment with God.

name: Crawl
description:
Crawl is a short (max. for 20 minutes) horror game, where you need to crawl through tight cave spaces, and take photos of people that "went missing" there.

While doing that, you need to keep your flashlight powered by hand cranking it, and constantly replace the camera's cartridge for every photo you take. But beware, you're not alone down there.

name: Flint: Treasure of Oblivion
description: Experience the golden age of piracy through a strong and original narrative, real-time exploration and turn-based tactical combat in Flint - Treasure of Oblivion.

name: The Crush House
description: Film and produce 1999's hottest reality TV show: The Crush House! Select a crush-worthy cast, satisfy voracious audiences and keep the show on air to uncover the sinister secrets behind this darkly comic thirst-person shooter.

name: Tetrisweeper
description: Tetrisweeper is an addictive and mind-bending fusion of Tetris and Minesweeper, which forces the player to keep up with both games at once. Tetrominoes fall, and each square acts like a minesweeper tile: fill every empty space and correctly flag or reveal each hidden tile to clear a row! Let the tower reach the top or click on a mine, and that's game over.

name: Divine Rush
description: Divine Rush is a battle royale platform game for up to 16 players. The game is about outsmarting the rivals using shooting, hooking, or trapping tactics, collecting diamonds, and earning upgrades.

name: Vectron
description: Officially only published on The Games Collection 2, later declared freeware by Cas Cremers, the author. Won the 1st prize in the MSX Computer Magazine/Eurosoft games programming contest.

name: Clawball
description: Clawball is a Cat vs Cat VR Soccer Game. Use your hands to run, climb, jump and "kick" the ball in this multiplayer game developed by the creators of the Pixel Ripped franchise ARVORE Immersive Experiences

name: Turbo Golf Racing: Deep Space Bundle
description: Take your garage to outer space with the Deep Space Bundle, featuring Planet Balls and the Tech Jet car!

name: Turbo Golf Racing: Ultimate Bundle
description: Spice up your garage with the Ultimate Bundle, featuring Pet Cosmetics, Planet Balls, Buffet Balls and the Tech Jet car!

name: SteamWorld Build: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: The Jackbox Decade Bundle
description: The Jackbox Decade Bundle is a collection of 50 fan-favorite Jackbox games from Party Packs 1-10 for one low price. It's great for game nights with friends, family get-togethers, and more! And there's no special equipment required - your internet-connected device is your controller.

name: Alchemist Bundle
description: Become the world's greatest Alchemist with this bundle containing Alchemist: The Potion Monger and Alchemist Simulator!

name: Dreamers: Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
DREAMERS is an adventure game made for those who cherish nostalgia for video games, with the goal of rekindling the sensations and emotions experienced while playing games during the 1990s. With its calm pacing of the story, melancholic ambiance, charismatic characters, and orchestral soundtrack, the game immerses players in a vibrant low-poly, open-map setting, offering approximately 15 hours of gameplay.

This bundle edition includes DREAMERS video game, the Original Soundtrack, and the Digital Art Book experience!

name: SEX HELP
description: SEX HELP - is an erotic game in the genre of "Arkanoid", in which you will have to break the cubes and gradually discover really beautiful and hot images.

name: I Got Straddled by a Femboy
description: You find yourself at the horse racetrack without any entertainment. Try to find something to do...

name: Crypt of the NecroDancer: Hatsune Miku
description: Descend through the Crypt of the NecroDancer as the one and only Hatsune Miku! With your trusty leek, iconic outfits, and dazzling dance moves, face down any enemy that comes your way with style.

name: Card Miner
description: Card Miner is the ultimate fusion of collecting, strategy, and anime allure. In this clicker game, you embark on a quest to collect rare cards, each featuring a stunningly illustrated woman with unique stats and sets of abilities.

name: Tower! Simulator 3: LPPT Airport
description: Welcome to Lisbon Airport, officially known as Humberto Delgado Airport. The major aviation hub of Portugal developed by FeelThere with beautiful background scenery, taxi signs and hand placed taxi lights, numbered gate stands. Let's find out how you control the 12th largest airport in Tower! Sim 3.

name: Welcome to Paradize: Archeology Quest
description: Archaeologist Quest Set

name: Hotdog Kitchen
description: Set to what a lot of people are calling a banging soundtrack, this casual puzzle game challenges you to fit as much meat into a jar as you can.

name: Music Man 3: Last Dance
description: Collect all music notes in 3 different big worlds to finish maps. Beware dangerous enemies and use platforms to move forward. Also try to find crystals to get achievements

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Monster Trucks Pack
description: Experience oversized emotions with the immense BIGFOOT Monster Truck, the unstoppable Gunkster, the ferocious Mega-Wrex and the mighty Rhinomite. Get ready for crushing victories with the Monster Trucks Pack!

name: Stygian: Outer Gods
description: Dive into a hostile world that challenges your very existence, in this survival horror game with RPG elements. Unravel a thousand-year-old mystery, risk your sanity and face the Outer Gods with your skills. Every bullet and the decision counts now, are you up to the task?

name: Synthetic Soul: Neon
description: Synthetic Soul: Neon is an immersive modern life sim with an in-depth robot companion. Discover the past and change your future.

name: Final Fantasy Restored & Rebalanced
description: Restored & Rebalanced is a bugfix and rebalance hack for the original, NES Final Fantasy that aims at fixing the game's notorious bugs, adding several quality of life features and smoothing over the game's difficulty curve, as well as adding some bonus postgame content.

name: Living Legends: Fallen Sky
description: When your botanist brother finds the legendary beans, he asks you to join him to celebrate! But your hopes for a joyous reunion are quickly dashed when you find him missing and a giant attacks! With stolen magical items wracking havoc on the town, can you stop the Sky Kingdom's wrath and save your brother in time? Find out in this spell-binding hidden-object puzzle adventure!

name: Terraria: Journey's End
description: Terraria: Journey's End is a major update to Terraria released on the game's 9th anniversary. From new ways to play the game, to over 1000 new items to find and craft, to new bosses to challenge, and even a full-pass review of all content of the game for balance, graphic quality, and mechanics - truly, Journey's End has something for everyone.

name: Batman: Return of the Joker
description: Batman: Return of the Joker for the Game Boy is a platformer in which the Dark Knight must cross four levels to confront his arch-enemy, the Joker.

name: Nightmare Kart
description: Nightmare Kart is a legally distinct racing game that features 20 racers, 16 maps, a full campaign mode with boss fights, and VS Battle mode!

name: Ninja Hero Cats

name: Strike Master Bowling

name: Star Soldier
description:
Star Soldier is a budget remake of the classic top-down shooter which puts you behind the cockpit of a lone starfighter as you attempt to stop an alien invasion.

This remake features a completely new polygonal engine with new stages, enemies and weapons. Additionally the game has been specifically redesigned for the PSP's 16:9 screen, meaning you have to turn the console on its side to play the game in a vertical orientation.

name: Speakeasy: Last Call
description:
Fandisc for Speakeasy.

Players will revisit the original cast to experience side stories, new art, and a music player featuring the full soundtrack from the original game.

The objective is to explode the orb, defeat other rivals, and rescue Princess Electra who is stuck in the final stage.
Break the treasure chests and take the items that come out to strengthen yourself and give yourself a leg up on your rivals.

You try to leave the house, but the door won't open.
You have to find a way out...

Find the pattern from the repeating station platform and escape! A mysterious, respect-based escape game from the enigmatic dark ground station to the exit, "Sanbansen"

name: Zaque's Game
description: A strategy, survival, horror game in which you play a card game against a serial killer. Take turns placing cards, watch out for matches and face cards, slap faster than your opponent and steal the whole deck!

name: Zombodesert
description: Are you afraid of running out of water in a desert? Well, it doesn't seem to be the biggest danger you can encounter.

name: World of Shooting: Killhouse 50m Hangar Arena
