description: World of Shooting: Practical Shooting Campaign has more than 80 stages for the pistol, shotgun and carbine, rifle, machine gun.

name: World of Shooting: Lifetime Shooting Club Member
description: World of Shooting: Lifetime Shooting Club Member DLC gives several benefits: - access to the weapons marked with the bage Club Member Only - access to accessories marked with the bage Club Member Only

name: World's Goodest Pup
description: A cozy roguelike deckbuilder where you enter dog shows! Collect new tricks, groom for stats, unlock breeds, and accessorize at shops as you make your way to the top dog podium. Fluffy, heartwarming runs await in World's Goodest Pup!

name: YAYS: Your Adventure Your Story
description: Fantasy Turn-Based RPG. Make group of 1-4 characters and wander across world with rich lore, that you can fill by your imagination. The world that is never the same thanks to randomise mechanism. Every player has own story and unique experience. It is Your Adventure and Your Story! YAYS

name: You Are My Treasure
description: “You are my Treasure” is a swashbuckling pirate comedy visual novel and yuri dating sim. Play as Captain Carmen “Cards” Rodriguez as she goes on an epic adventure across the Caribbean to find the booty of her dreams.

name: Word Sylla
description: Hexa Word Sylla Word Submit Puzzle offers a dynamic gameplay experience that will keep you hooked for hours. Delve into the depths of your vocabulary and logic skills as you unravel syllabic mysteries and unlock the full potential of the English language.

name: Wizards vs. Soldiers And Robots
description: Grab a gun and punch those stupid wizards RIGHT IN THEIR DUMB FACES

name: Wishlands Defence
description: Wishlands Defence is a deckbuilding tower defence game. Collect resources and craft defence towers. Protect the cute villagers from the enemy attacks.

name: Wobbles
description: Play as a godly figure, guiding a line of adorable creatures called Wobbles across a landscape that you manipulate using various gadgets. As you do this, you progress the Wobbles civilization through the eras and advancing their technology, ultimately unlocking new gadgets for you to use.

name: Ur
description: The Royal Game of Ur, also called Twenty Squares, has a history stretching over five millennia with examples found across the Mediterranean! This is a 3D gameplay experience taking you into the ancient world! The game board set is a 3D reconstruction of an ancient example from a museum.

name: VRLegs
description: Welcome to "VRLegs", where the thrill of parkour meets the immersive world of virtual reality. Step into a realm where your movements are fluid, intuitive, and empowering.

name: Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Realms of Ruin - Gaunt Summoner
description: The Gaunt Summoner Pack introduces a new playable hero to Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Realms of Ruin for Conquest Mode and Multiplayer Mode, bolstering the Disciples of Tzeentch.

name: Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Realms of Ruin - Kurdoss Valentian, The Craven King
description: Kurdoss Valentian, The Craven King Pack introduces a new playable hero to Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Realms of Ruin for Conquest Mode and Multiplayer Mode, bolstering the Nighthaunt.

name: Windstorm: Start of a Great Friendship - Remastered
description: Rediscover the breathtaking world of Windstorm, based on the established film and book series, Ostwind! Delve into the fascinating story of Mika, a girl known as a horse whisperer, as she befriends the majestic black stallion called Windstorm – with fully updated graphics and a new photo mode!

name: Unbreaded
description: Unbreaded is a side-scrolling adventure game where you navigate a gingerbread man through a bakery battleground, blending puzzle-solving with dynamic combat against animated kitchenware, all set within a heartfelt story of creation and rebellion against industrialization.

name: Undead Tower Defense
description: Where the player will have to defend the location by placing towers and withstand waves of attacking enemies. In this 3D game, you will find yourself facing the task of repelling hordes of skeletons and monsters.

name: Undefeatable
description: Accurate gunplay, high-speed movement with lots of expression, and character customization. What more could you want in an arena shooter, and what more does it take to become undefeatable?

name: Undusted: Letters from the Past
description: Undusted: Letters from the Past is a casual game focused on restoring dirty items to their pristine state. Use a variety of tools to return objects to their original appearance. As you clean each item belonging to the protagonist, reflect on the significance and stories behind them.

name: Uneasy Memories
description: A Psychological Horror Game Set in Everyday Life

name: The Gauntlet
description: The Gauntlet is a fast-paced movement driven game where you must survive a series of trials to claim the prize, your freedom. Bad Bat's brutal Game-Show has got a new contestant, lets hope they live to see the re-runs.

name: Decadent
description: Decadent is a story-driven FPS combining atmospheric exploration, horror and combat into an immersive experience. Become John Lorn, a Great War veteran turned decadent occultist on a quest to save your lost son and uncover an ancient secret; challenging not only your skills, but your very humanity.

name: Planet Surf
description: In this 3D precision platformer, you become a slippery penguin who must waddle through a strange world, filled with many penguin challenges. If you struggle to move mouse good you will become sad penguin. Bounce, surf, and fly through the air at high speeds to unlock maximum penguin potential. (^O^)

name: Cotton Candy's Terror Factory
description: A Sweet and strange horror experience, you are Contestant 9127.

name: Planet Pioneers
description: Planet Pioneers is a relaxing building strategy and puzzle game where you place hexagonal tiles around pristine planets. Grow your colony, fulfill quests for your settlers and enable new buildings along the way. Shape the planet as you wish until it’s time to move on to your next challenge.

name: Aurora Hills: Chapter 1
description: Aurora Hills: Chapter 1 is the first part in series of point and click puzzle adventure games. Follow the journey of Ethan Hill, a park ranger tasked with investigating strange disappearances from the region to uncover the mystery of Aurora Hills!

name: Science Soldier
description: "Science Soldier" is an indie action and shooting game with an isometric view, focused on a linear space adventure. Face tactical challenges and alien enemies through varied scenarios, advancing through an intriguing science fiction storyline.

name: Paintball Playground
description: Paintball Playground VR is Sports/Shooter game where you can compete against other players on SpeedBall, SpeedQB or Woodsball maps.

name: Snow Blower: Idle Game
description: Snow Blower - Idle Game is a Free to Play game where you'll blow away snow, employ helper robots, unlock upgrades, complete tasks and goals and much more.

name: Goblin Boom
description: Embark on the role of a cunning goblin, whose passion is to place explosive bombs around the map. Your goal is to defeat enemies, complete levels, and become a true master of explosions! Get ready for an explosive adventure in the world of goblins and bombs!

name: Hungry Tiger
description: Hungry Tiger game is an exciting physics-based puzzle game in which your task is to deliver a piece of meat to a hungry tiger by breaking the chains in the right order and at the right moment.

name: Ethereal Fracture
description: An exciting fantasy Roguelike-RPG that immerses you in a constantly changing universe! Randomly generated dungeons, challenging enemies, powerful bosses, equipment, and abilities. Switch between old-school pixel art and modern pixel art as you unravel the mysteries of Ethereal Fracture!

name: Mineval
description: MinegamerFrance presents Mineval, a free-to-play survival game! This game is in the 3rd person, a specific goal and to survive with all the necessary means, which will be on the Mineval map. This game will listen to the community and do its utmost to record as much demand as possible!

name: Pool of Madness
description: A retro-styled Lovecraftian pool game with roguelite elements. Shoot some balls. Unleash horrors from beyond. Go insane. Try again.

name: El-Drifto
description: The game aims is to drive, and drift your car in the city. You can also jumps on the wall and to do flips. Earn money by drifting and doing flips without flipping the car on the roof. Level up and buy new wheels, turbo and cars with your money and customize your car colour for your own pleasure.

name: Fish Hero
description: A physics, parkour adventure! Launch yourself up a collection of biomes to reach the summit. Compete against friends by pushing them off platforms to throw them off course. Explore a unique world as a fish out of water.

name: Secret of the Deep
description: Uncover the Secret of the Deep and face the evil beneath, whispering your name. Fight for hope for those deemed lost, and discover your past. Become a hero in this action adventure with a unique blend of RPG elements, hack’n’slash combat, resource management, and a gripping story!

name: Eureka! Superconductor Lab
description: Eureka! Superconductor Lab is a crafting+simulation game where you synthesize materials and witness the astonishing scientific phenomena. Work alongside scholars, science geeks, and your girlfriend to synthesize the Holy Grail of modern physics: a room-temperature superconductor!

name: Melan
description: In Melan, the player as An will go everywhere and collect memories, thereby revealing some of what is happening in the game. The game is built in a storytelling format with situations that the player gradually discovers through interacting with the environment and NPCs.

name: Hitting Balls
description: Hitting balls - a jaw-dropping arena action game with realistic physics and destructible elements. Roll balls with your friends. Many interesting levels and weapons will not let you get bored!

name: PuzzMiX
description:
In PuzzMiX, players will control falling "Lola Pods" to merge pairs into increasingly larger types. As the Lola Pods get bigger and bigger, the player will earn bigger scores as the chaos becomes even harder to control. Online leaderboards are included to show off the best Lola MiXers around the world.

When players earn a certain amount of score, they'll unlock a new song from Lola herself to listen to during the game. 19 vocal tracks are included in addition to 1 instrumental BGM.

name: Russian CyberVillage Simulator
description: Develop a village colony on Mars, using various resources and bringing the unique flavor of Russian culture to the distant space.

name: The Anomalous Hour
description: You are alone in a deserted station. Or are you? Take pictures of strange anomalies around the station and you might find a way out.

name: Jewel Match Origins 3: Camelot Castle - Collector's Edition
description: Embark on a regal journey with the latest addition to the glittering world of Jewel Match games! Unleash your inner architect as you solve match-3 puzzles and unlock the power to build and design the fabled Camelot Castle. The journey awaits, noble puzzler!

name: Street Wise: A Teenager's Story
description: Orphan is a raw and unflinching life simulator that throws you into the shoes of a teenager facing a difficult family life. Navigate the emotional rollercoaster of a fractured home while juggling the pressures of school, friendships, and carving your own path in the world.

name: Drug Dealer Sim: Street Hustle
description: Drug Dealer Sim: Street Hustle is a thrilling journey from a small-time gangster to the revered Godfather of Hollywood, Las Vegas, and Chicago in the Prohibition Era!

name: Tech Shop Simulator
description: Manage your own tech shop. Arrange the shelves, buy the products, put them at the price you want and sell them. Expand, organize and upgrade the shop. Hire and manage employees.

name: Craft Wars
description: Enter the adrenaline-fueled world of "Craft Wars," a VR multiplayer shooter for up to 16 players. With the power to craft every detail of your weapon using 3D pixel blocks, unleash your creativity and dominate the battlefield with your unique arsenal.

name: Hello World
description: You have strayed into the world of computer! ? During the exploration, you will have a series of interesting interactions with folders, garbage files, Word documents, PowerPoint documents, Excel documents, anti-virus software, blinking cursors while typing and even binary 0 and 1 in computer!

name: Mancers of Magic
description: Mancers of Magic is a Spell-based Shooter where you must fight your way through islands of monsters to become the ultimate Mancer!

name: Dot & Dot Dungeons
description: Adventure in dungeons that change every time you enter! The equipment you get in the dungeon is randomly selected to determine its strength! What will you see at the end of your adventure?

name: Idle Battle RPG
description: А unique combination of idle game with RPG elements. Fight with enormous monsters, upgrade your stats, buy outfit and use prestige to get permanent power ups. But once your are dead the journey starts from the very beginning!

name: Ghost Talker
description: Have you ever wondered if your house is haunted? With ghost talker you can find out and have conversations with potential paranormal entities.

name: Chromatrix
description: Defend against waves of unique enemies in this old-school tower defense game, where colors are your key to victory.

name: Friends in a Room
description: Welcome to Ouroboros, a vibrant and cozy club where you can hang out with friends in a unique, sandbox-style setting. Step into a colorful world where men in stylish latex outfits come together to dance, chat, and enjoy each other's company.

name: Cat Girl Survivor
description: "Cat Girl Survivor" is a dot graphic berserker-like game featuring a variety of unique characters and colorful skills. Defend the world of cat girls with a variety of charming characters!

name: Cat Purrtrol: Find All 100!
description: Cat Purrtrol: Find All 100! is a relaxing, short game where you find 100 cats hidden in a drawing. It is completely free to play and is a fun quick game to spend a few minutes on!

name: Police on Duty 2
description: Prepare yourself to enforce the law and preserve tranquility in Police on Duty 2.

name: Pals Go Only Up!
description: Welcome to Pals Go Only Up! Get ready for a wild ride up the mountainside. It's not your average climbing game; here, precision is everything. Brace yourself for some real nail-biting moments as you navigate through challenging cliffs and obstacles.

name: Kingdom Of Peace
description: Take on the role of an ordinary, hard-working and adventure-hungry Racław, who wants to be as good a man as his father. Help people in the medieval land of the Kingdom of Peace! Fight, Explore and Meet new faces in this amazing world.

name: Roboloop
description: The puzzle game where you program a loop of commands to help a pair of robots navigate a factory floor

name: Time Travel Cafe
description: Alchemy type cooking sim about Malin and her mom who were sent to the past by their newly bought cafe ♡

name: Henry's Forgotten Performance
description: Explore the abandoned theater, solve interesting puzzles to move forward, uncover the horrifying truth about Henry and find what you've been looking for. but know that you are not alone, and they can find you at any moment.

name: 3Souls: Parallel Edition
description: In the world of Mustland, each Ánima has a different soul, and they will see, feel, hear and play the world in a different way!

name: 7Groves
description: A game in which you explore surreal and beautiful forests.

name: Abandoned
description:
Abandoned is a psychological thriller set in a universe created by Headshot Interactive.
You play as a security officer aboard a space station. Your mission: Search for alien life forms and make contact with them.

name: County Courier
description: Drive around town to deliver the packages loaded in your truck! Earn a paycheck to pay for gas and truck upgrades!

name: Cozy Designer
description: Position furniture and objects however you prefer and create 60 incredibly cozy environments. With no right or wrong, the only limit is your imagination! Create your own gallery and share your designs with the whole world.

name: Cozy Night
description: A fun game of ball combining in a house where it's cold outside but warm inside.

name: Cricket Heroes: VR
description: Step into the exhilarating world of cricket with VR Cricket Heroes! Whether you're a die-hard cricket fan or a casual gamer, we've got all the action you crave. From thrilling super overs to intense test matches, and the prestigious World Cup, our game offers it all.

name: Crowborne
description: Crowborne is a 2D platformer With the ability to Melee, shoot Run and Fly around!

name: Crystal Horizons
description: Lead your band of sky pirates on a tactical adventure across the floating islands of Sazdemir! A Tactics RPG inspired by legends of old, with fresh new ideas. Build your crew from a variety of unique and technical classes, master Elemental Reactions on the field, and execute masterful strategies!

name: Crowd Control VR
description: Challenge your observation skills in the immersive world of ancient Greece! Identify impostors amid diverse crowds across 25+ unique levels. Designed for accessibility, even VR newcomers can enjoy the thrill. Uncover impostors and dominate the crowds in Crowd Control VR!

name: Daydreamer
description: Daydreamer: An action-adventure RPG game where you dream away your classes to explore an action-packed world of adventure made from the topics surrounding you. Your brain is the limit! so go and have fun!

name: D-Day VR Museum
description: Step into the pages of history with "D-Day VR Museum", an immersive virtual reality experience that brings the monumental events of D-Day to life like never before. Transport yourself back to June 6, 1944, and witness the heroic actions of Allied forces during the largest amphibious assault in history.

name: Deadly Footprints
description: You find yourself being chased through snow-covered terrain by a relentless killer who is tracking your every move by following your footprints. Run, sneak, hide and use the items you find to evade the killer, in a pixelart horror game where every step you take could be your last.

name: Deeper Than Hell
description: Deeper Than Hell is an action roguelike for 1-4 players where you play as mysterious mage, driven by the legend of a great treasure, he goes deeper and deeper to find the legendary treasure. Wield weapons & accessories, build synergies and find out what lies deeper than hell.

name: Dark Umbra
description: Fight against the Umbral Horde on your way to take down the sinister sorcerer who doomed the world. Team up with friends or go it alone as you level up your character and collect powerful relics in this action rogue-like.

name: Daydam Knight
description: Daydam Knight is a roguelike deckbuilder game. You play as a knight who is trying to destroy demons that have attacked his land. Use your Powerful cards and destroy all the enemies.

name: Purpose Calling
description: Saving people, solving puzzles, and repairing what’s broken. Designed for young heroes aged 7-9, Purpose Calling invites players to step into the shoes of a hero who's power suit allow them to be a detective, EMT, firefighter, and construction worker to make a difference, one adventure at a time!

name: Discin
description: Discin is about throwing the disc in the basket. Experience the beauty of flight as you explore our custom-crafted disc golf courses. DISCIN currently features 3 unique courses and 4 discs with varied flight characteristics.

name: Dopamine
description: The roguelike where desires and temptations manifest tangibly, and where the pursuit of pleasure can become a trap, break free from the shackles of temptation as you strive to achieve your aspirations and overcome the obstacles that haunt you!

name: Doom Survivors
description: "Doom Survivors" is an action-packed Roguelike game where you obliterate hordes of enemies with deadly weapons, turning them to ashes at your fingertips. Engage in intense battles with ruthless and merciless evil leaders.

name: Doodle TD 2
description: Doodle TD Is back and better than before, Place and smack enemies down with force in this brand new tower defense game. We added color from the original game as the evil mastermind has colored the world of doodle land.

name: Doodle Factory
description: Welcome to Doodle Factory - your ticket to the world of factory fun! Dive into building and designing with ever-changing boards. Get creative, boost your efficiency with cool upgrades, and make each factory uniquely yours!

name: Domino Clicker
description: Domino Clicker is a simple clicker game where you can enjoy the thrill of toppling dominoes. With just a click, you can set up plenty of dominoes and revel in the mesmerizing cascade as they fall. It offers straightforward gameplay that anyone can enjoy, providing a calming experience for the mind.

name: Dot Hop
description: Dot Hop is a grid-based connect-the-dots game with deceptively challenging puzzles. Find a path from start to end without leaving any dots behind.

name: Dragon Title
description: Card game deck builder with Bullet Hell style combat. Includes Roguelike mode and campaign.

name: Dreadrun
description: DreadRun is a top-down bullet hell with roguelike elements. Where you must explore and gather various forms of loot such as guns, potions, and perks in a limited period of time in order to evade and shoot hordes of various enemies while escorting a payload to safety.

name: Dreamboat
description: This is a wonderful game!

name: Dungeon of Memories
description: A world where a beast consume people's memories. With scant memories left, An 18-year-old fall into this Dungeon through coma, faces challenges to piece together his past, battling creatures, interact with unique NPCs, each memory reclaimed a victory in the hauntingly fascinating dungeon.

name: Dungeon Slime Hero
description: Dungeon Slime Hero is a Roguelite Dungeon Crawler for semi-casual indie players! Explore the dungeon, level up, and acquire random loot to develop an overpowered build! DSH features click to move and attack controls with a unique combat system for customizing your Slime!

name: Dustino 64
description: An indie 3D platformer inspired by Super Mario 64, go from nobody to a hero as Dustin, through vibrant hub worlds and stages to collect enough Gems to save Queen Merigold.

name: Dustopia
description: You live in a world where your card game playing skills determine whether you survive another day. Build your deck, battle your opponents, create your own cards, solve puzzles, help people, and complete your main mission.

name: Elumin
description: Worker of honor from Lindenauw, you are mandated on the Tswinoberg exploitation site. A first person exploration experience.

name: Elemental Exiles
description: Elemental Exiles is an RPG deckbuilding roguelike. Play as one of 12 heroes, each with their own personal quest, starting location and initial cards. Overcome challenging battles and adapt to unexpected narrative encounters as you grow your deck and explore.

name: Edenbound
description: Journey through darkness with "Edenbound." A red panda braves chaos to reach Eden amidst encroaching demons. Navigate landscapes, confront foes, and unravel mysteries. Guide the panda, restore balance.

name: EcoQuest: Explore, Discover, Protect!
description: “Eco Quest: Explore, Discover, Protect!” thrusts players into the role of Kai, a spirited environmental crusader on a mission to reshape the world’s perspective on water and climate.

name: Eclipse of Elysium
description: JRPG meets Western RPG: Help Aria uncover a dark conspiracy. Battle through hordes of enemies and meet complex and charming characters in a colorful fantasy-world.

name: Eastern Heroes
description: Recruit martial arts heroes, practice worldly martial arts, inherit the talents of past generations, then be chivalrous and righteous, finally become a generation of famous heroes, defeat the major sects, stand on top of the martial arts, and become famous all over the world!

name: Earth Defenders
description: During the game, you play the role of one of the army commanders who faces alien invaders.-Expand your base-Extract raw materials-Create troops-Counteract invaders

name: Endloop
description: You are trapped in an endless stairway with no end in sight. Solve twisted puzzles and maybe you will escape your fate.

name: Marvel Quiz Quest
description: Sin descripción

name: Fairy Treasure
description: Gorgeous original brick-breaking game with tons of new fun bricks and amazing power-ups never seen before!

name: Extant: Zombie Eradication Co-op Simulation
description: The apocalypse was years ago. Those still living are termed the 'Extant'. The dead can smell the living from a mile away. Because of this, Extant SOG groups of four operators have been tasked with infiltrating areas with supplies alone to retrieve for the Extant civilians. You are one of them.

name: FaceYourFear
description: Face your fear is a horror game based on a story with puzzles and a realistic and stressful atmosphere.

name: Faire Hollow
description: Faire Hollow is a cozy 2D crafting management sim and adventure RPG, set in a Renaissance Faire. Establish attractions and games, manage food vendors and shops, and interact with the eccentric locals. Explore a colorful and magical world, and battle the strange monsters that come out at night.

name: Fatal Terminal
description: A retrofuturistic co-op horror about extracting secret objects from abandoned space stations for corporate clients.

name: Fatal Falls
description: In Fatal Falls you explore the dark secrets of "The Grand Elysium", a posh luxury hotel. Interact with its guests, drink a cocktail at the bar, peruse the noble premises – the choice is yours! Just make sure you choose appropriate answers when talking to people who are mentally unstable...

name: Felbound
description: Felbound is a challenging and ruthless roguelike game. Embark on a journey into a mysterious dungeon, facing off against orcs and goblins with a plethora of weapons spells and items!

name: Feralbound Online
description: Feralbound Online encourages you to survive, roleplay, and fight to your hearts content. Featuring endless possibilities for customization; journey throughout different lands as you uncover secrets and meet new friends!

name: The Mandalorian: Chapter 3 - The Sin
description: Sin descripción

name: Floops Big House Adventure
description: Shoot, loot, and toot your way through 90's cartoon inspired Floops Big House Adventure! Floops is a wave based roguelike arcade game. Learn enemy attacks and upgrade combinations in order to take down the Monster Overlord!

name: Forgotten Mechs
description: Quick mech battle for two players. Choose weapons, explore the map and destroy your opponent.

name: Forest Hunt: VR
description: Embark on a thrilling virtual safari in 'VR Forest Hunt,' where the untamed wilderness comes to life in stunning detail. With multiple game modes, including the challenging safari forest hunt and the adrenaline-pumping night forest hunt, each session offers a unique and intense experience.

name: Forest Fellers
description: Forest Fellers! A game about Gnomes, Trees, and chopping them. Generate wood as you hire your very own Forest Fellers (Gnomes) to fell forests YOU make. Your Gnomes will grow and level up the more they chop allowing you to get more and more efficient trees for them to take down.

name: FMV Soulslike
description: Described as an unholy union of retro nostalgic FMV style atop a modern day soulslike design- a truly unforgettable adventure awaits.

name: Flying Ferret
description: In this action game, a mysterious ferret with special jumping ability and its friends are made to jump and fly at high speed from island to island over the blue ocean to fly farther and farther.

name: Flow Factory
description: Flow Factory is a physics-based factory automation game. Tinker with complex production lines, make them faster and more efficient. Deal with freely floating pieces and defy gravity. Build, research, optimize. Relax and enjoy everything running smoothly.

name: Forsaken Isles: Xenia's Defense
description: Dive into "Forsaken Isles: Xenia's Defense," a top-down, twin-stick tower defense game where you cast spells and strategize to repel waves of enemies in a fantasy world teetering on the brink.

name: Fowl Swarm
description: Just another day at the farm, face seemingly endless swarms of killer chickens. They will keep coming, you can't hide. Survive for as long as you can...

name: Fresh Milk For Mars
description: A cute puzzle game in which you have to catch cows and bring them back to Mars.

name: Ánima
description: Sin descripción

name: Akuyaku Reijou ha Ringoku no Outaishi ni Dekiai Sareru
description: Sin descripción

name: Galactic Vanguard
description: In Galactic Vanguard, embark on an epic adventure across a galaxy filled with mystery and conflict. As a brave space explorer, your choices will shape the fate of planets and civilizations. Discover uncharted worlds, engage in strategic battles, and forge your path in this handcrafted universe.

name: Gaming Cafe Life
description: Manage your very own gaming cafe!

name: Garden of Aiden
description: Venture into "Garden of Aiden," a 2D Metroidvania on mystical Neura Eden. As Aiden, an AI blending magic, tech, and nature, challenge Discord, a rogue AI. Unravel a realm where elements merge, on a quest to restore balance and save your kin. Adventure awaits in this epic of discovery and unity.

name: Gero-Gero
description: Gero Gero! (Ribbit Ribbit) Control the frog with your voice and guide it to its friend. You can eat the bees, but be careful not to touch them because they sting! Now, let's guide the frog to its friends! (This game use voice as a controller, so microphone is required)

name: Ghosthero: Shadow of Vengeance
description: Command your fortress, build defenses, and fight waves of evil. Explore the open world, gather resources, upgrade and finally unleash vengeance on the Titans of Evil. A unique blend of defense, exploration and management. The game is a modern mix of Kingdom and Shadow of the Colossus.

name: Ghost of Viyk
description: In the lands of Vyik, death is just the beginning. Tailor your items and abilities to create your unique battle style — and slay enemies who never play by the rules, in this Ukrainian Grimfolk roguelite action. Because the price of freedom is never fair.

name: Gingar Ail
description: Gingar Ail is a story-based SF RPG indie game set on the Moon Base. Become Asta, the protagonist and one of the agents who lost all her memories in an accident, and discover secrets of the Moon Base. Battles involve turn-based strategy.

name: Astrocop
description: Sin descripción

name: G-Mode Archives+: Tantei Kibugawa Ryousuke Jiken-tan Vol. 14 - Rasen no Kan Satsujin Jiken
description: Two cases are intertwined in a spiral, Heading toward a sad truth.

name: Gobocore
description: Roguelite Turn Based Auto-Battler about little goblins rescuing their kidnapped tribe members. Smash. Evolve. Survive.

name: Godslayer Arena
description: Godslayer Arena is a fusion of autobattlers and action-rpgs. Draft a set of synergizing spells for your Godslayer to cast and witness their power as they take on the arena. Combat is performed automatically, and success is determined through strategic build creation.

name: Gods of the Arena Dungeon
description: Destroy arena vermin, level up, choose your class path, get loot, and slay other players. Destroy the bosses of the arena without being slain, and perhaps your ascent into arena God-hood will be recorded into legend! Now remastered!

name: Golden Road
description: Hey buddy, have you ever driven around your city?

name: GOS: Gain Of Squad
description: GOS: Gain Of Squad is a multiplayer FPS. Feel the battle with tactical mechanics and destructible environment in different game modes!

name: Granser
description: A story driven rpg inspired by JRPGS like Xenogears/saga, featuring a unique turn based battle system. Follow Saragat and his dubious allies as they untangle the web of lies and attempt to dismantle the shadowy conspiracy of "The Core", as a far greater threat will reawaken.

name: GT and the Evil Factory
description: Discover the Evil Factory’s secrets and fight for the freedom and dignity of robot-kind. Explore the factory, inside and out, dodge security drones, and stop the robot foreman’s evil plans.

name: Greed and Fear and the Rest
description: You are ready to say goodbye to life, but are you prepared to face your life's truth? Navigate a grad student's life between greed and fear in his final 6 hours (and beyond) in this BL visual novel.

name: Gregg: Tower Defence
description: Play as Gregg. Gather, build and destroy your slimy enemies in this thrilling pixel art tower defence!

name: Grub Truck
description: Grub Truck is a food truck simulation game where you cook up mouthwatering meals, strategise enticing menus, set the perfect prices, complete quests and decorate your trucks with style. Invest your earnings wisely to upgrade your fleet as you build, cook, and conquer the culinary scene!

name: Hearts in Orbit: When Stars Align
description: Hearts in Orbit is a fantasy romance visual novel that follows two stars who fell in love and have reincarnated as humans. Will they remember their origins? Will they fall in love again? That's for you to decide.

name: Hell's Bell
description: GO TO HELL ... in this hand-drawn, hack-n-slash adventure. "Hell's Bell" is a story-driven brawler following Bell, who after learning a family secret, finds herself fighting endless hordes of demons in the underworld.

name: Hemlock
description: An action packed 3rd person Roguelike, With a rich tapestry of handcrafted levels, a multitude of game-changing items, and thrilling boss fights. Are you ready to face the unknown, rewrite your destiny, and emerge victorious in the fight to restore Hemlock?

name: Heroes of Latera
description: Heroes of Latera is a 3d fantasy style survivor based in the realm of Latera. Explore unique classes each with their own individual abilities and play styles. Fight through the endless waves of Eu'roks hoard as you amass wealth, experience, and a pile of bodies.

name: Hexceed: Year 4 Pass
description: This is your pass to 6 exciting new worlds to complete in hexceed! With 700+ levels to complete!

name: Hexceed: Rubrum
description: This DLC unlocks a brand new world for hexceed: Rubrum Puzzle your way through 140 new levels - levels include all previously introduced mechanics!

name: Hexforger
description: Hexforger is a fast-paced roguelite in which you cast magic by combining the three primordial orbs. Craft and upgrade powerful spells in the heat of battle. Loot treasures hidden within the rifts. Die, and spend hard-earned gold to return stronger than ever. The realms are yours to conquer.

name: Hidden Riddles. The Amazon Mystery
description: Help the detective crack a difficult case! Hundreds of exciting levels! Hidden Riddles - The Amazon Mystery: Solve mysterious puzzles!

name: Hidden Cats: The Last of Cats
description: Explore this mysterious post-apocalyptic world by finding cute cats and this black and white world will be colore.

name: Horror Tomb
description: Horror Tomb is a first person Chinese horror adventure puzzle game set in an Oriental context.

name: How to Survive the Night shift
description: As you begin your night shift in the aged warehouse, an unsettling atmosphere descends. Shadows flit in your peripheral vision, strange whispers echo around you. Finding a mysterious list of rules, you wonder: prank or something serious? Nervously, you step into the dimly lit warehouse.

name: Suffocation
description:
Best Friends love eachother. Best Friends care about eachother, look out for one another. Best Friends never go anywhere without eachother.

Best Friends should never lie to one another. Best Friends should never fight with eachother, make eachother jealous. Best Friends love eachother.

That's what he thinks, anyway. He's your Best Friend. Nothing more or less.

name: A Dog Tale
description: A single-level platformer game where you play as a boy collecting keys and bones to bring to his dog.

name: AirBob
description: Sin descripción

name: Hydrogen
description: Enter a post-apocalyptic Sci-Fi world in 'Hydrogen,' a thrilling Roguelite ARPG. Navigate through procedurally generated instances, each playthrough offering unique challenges, random items, and perks to level up your character.

name: Hyperbeat
description: A rhythm game like no other. With an original soundtrack, fast paced gameplay, and unmatched heart, HYPERBEAT is a unique thrill for rhythm game veterans and rookies alike.

name: Hyperfield
description: Welcome to the exhilarating world of Hyperfield, a groundbreaking sports sensation that fuses the intensity of rugby with mind-bending supernatural abilities! Step onto the futuristic pitch where speed, strategy, and superhuman powers collide in an electrifying display of athleticism.

name: Incremental Island
description: Build and expand a vibrant civilization on a procedurally generated island

name: Inflatum
description: Inflatum is a cute animal rescue game. Rescue the poor hapless critter who is only trying to reach his stranded family. Save him from the hazards littering the landscape. Use gas tanks to inflate objects to come to the critter's aid.

name: InOutPath
description: You will play the role of a smart and agile kitten, learn and utilize various strange and interesting mechanisms to unlock 300+ puzzles that are extremely characteristic and full of challenges, to obtain an unforgettable puzzle-solving experience.

name: Insurrection
description: Insurrection is a dark fantasy soulslike RPG. Play as the Skeleton Monk, a powerful mage who can manipulate the elements. Create powerful martial arts combos to avenge your own death and discover the fate of your captured lover.

name: Interior Designer
description: Step into the world of Interior Designer. Embark on client jobs, dominate the Design League, and create stunning interiors. Shape your spaces, and unleash your style. Your masterpiece awaits.

name: Internity
description: A capitalist fever dream disguised as a corporate wellness guided meditation. Will you be stuck in the first day of your unpaid internship forever? A unique visual novel experience in virtual reality that combines absurd humor and trippy visuals to tell a story about you, an intern.

name: Introspection
description: IntroSpection is a top-down bullethell-like action game about a man forced to confront his past. Delve into memories and blast through waves of inner demons as you explore one man's mental purgatory.

name: Into the Restless Ruins
description: A roguelike deckbuilder where you build the dungeon you fight through. Each night use your cards to expand the ruins then battle through them harvesting Glimour from the residents, so The Maiden may grant your heart’s desire. But be warned - eventually your trespassing will awaken The Warden.

name: Inverted Journey
description: Inverted Journey is a mind-bending puzzle platformer where you can enter the negative space of levels. Use this unique ability to solve strange puzzles, collect hidden treasures, and journey on a quest to save your little brother from a terrible fate.

name: Down
description: Sin descripción

name: Jumping Orb
description: Jump, challenge, collect, win!

name: Jumplats
description: Jump through different levels in a game based on "the floor is lava".

name: Just Skill Shooter 3: 2D Edition
description: Try on the role of a shooter who opposes the whole world

name: Kazu Aether Origins
description: Kazu Aether Origins is a non-linear hack-slash action adventure on the Isles of Isvenness. Play as a Finnish Spitz as you overcome combat challenges, explore a world of vibrant handcrafted environmental art, and interact with satirical elements for a light-hearted, action-packed gameplay experience.

name: Keepers of Ancient Lands
description: ou are one of the defenders of ancient lands. In this game, you have to destroy crowds of enemies with the help of your faithful warriors.

name: Keep It Steady!
description: Try to see how high of a score you can get in Keep It Steady! Move the paddles individual sides up and down to try to guide a small ball into the correct hole. Watch out for the wrong holes though, If you hit too many it will be game over!

name: Killer Junkyard
description: The night is young and you are fuel. Evade grotesque mechanical-human creatures as you attempt to survive until dawn in this PSX style atmospheric horror game.

name: Killmaiden
description: A fast paced singleplayer arena shooter. Choose one of three goals to win each stage, explore the tech tree and defeat 10 bosses on the way to meet the devil on stage 66. What's the highest score you can reach?

name: Kindred
description: A physics-based 2D puzzle-platformer.

name: King of Retail 2
description: Ready to build another empire? You are once again back in the role as the manager, trying to make the best of a busy store. Find the right things to sell, get the right employees and turn every stone for a profit. Can you handle the pressure or will you buck under? Welcome to King of Retail 2.

name: Knight Island
description: Tile-based strategy with the best aspects of roguelike deck builders. On top of that, unique mechanics that allow you to shape your island as you wish. Knight Island is a game that blends these features you'll love in this genre and immerses you in unique battles.

name: Knight of Nevermore
description: Knight of Nevermore is a roguelike action-platformer featuring tight combat and diverse builds. Fight skillfully, platform carefully and equip yourself wisely if you plan to overcome the challenges of Nevermore.

name: Knuffi
description: Explore digital world with a cute cat-girl named "Knuffi" in this 2D pixelart platformer. Navigate through a variety of levels, each offering unique challenges. An adorable adventure awaits!

name: Life as a Lich
description: Embrace lichdom: research powerful spells, recruit undead legions, manage your domains, rule the underworld, and become a demigod!

name: Light and Shadow: Schatten über Empyria
description: Meet new companions, regain your memory after a stranding, join a story guild, save the world from the shadow, or plunge it into ruin.

name: Light Box
description: Roll and shine endlessly in this game! Move left, move right, avoid obstacles, and collect Life-Shields for protection. Watch out for traps and other dangerous boxes. Keep rolling and shining!

name: Miniatures
description: Miniatures is a cozy puzzle game where you start a journey in the world of a bookworm girl. In this journey, you're tasked with solving puzzles of miniature-style illustrations to create cities by fitting blocks, making paths by aligning roads & rivers and reanimating landmarks by matching pieces.

name: Night Run
description: A stylized night-time speed-running game

name: Obscuria
description: After the largest cruise ship in the world suffered a shipwreck and was invaded by ghosts, you must find Captain Blackhood after he disappeared, enter the great Nocturne and investigate all the secrets and mysteries.

name: Over the Net
description: Simple 2,5D volleyball. Just start game and enjoy it! 2 Game Modes (1vs1, 2vs2) | 4 Arenas (Beach, Castle, School and Mars) | 6 Colours to Choose Prove that you are the best volleyball player in the world!

name: Pinbot
description: Pinbot reimagines the timeless breakout game in an immersive 3D setting. Traditional brick formations now morph into incubators nurturing alien robots, demanding swift destruction! In this robotic realm, every element is mechanized.

name: Psyko
description: Framed and on the run, you'll carve a bloody path through a relentless cyberpunk city to escape your pursuers. Can you fight your way free in this unforgiving roguelike?

name: Quarantine
description: Quarantine is a TPS/FPS horror game. Players are expected to escape the quarantine zone by exploring the map, avoiding enemies, and using weapons if necessary.

name: ReCoil
description: ReCoil is a 2D Top-Down Shooter with a unique twist to it's genre. The recoil of your weapons launches you back.

name: Lavender's Botanicals
description: Sin descripción

name: Burari Sekai Untei
description:
Because there's Untei there! Challenge to go around the earth!

For some reason, it is an endless one-touch action that is just moving around the earth around 35 degrees north latitude.
Untei is a bar that is insecting, and people who walk on it will step on it, so let's avoid it by making full use of two-bar and one-bar swapping.

The goal is to circle the earth, but the game will continue until you make a mistake after achieving it, so how many times can you go around the earth? Let's challenge!

A super popular work that won the No. 1 out of about 2000 games in the action game genre popularity ranking of NTT DoCoMo "i-mode".

name: Legend of Gallant
description: An evil warlock has broken the crystal and unleashed magic onto the world. Stop the crystal's corruption and end the chaos in this Match 3 game.

name: Untei DX
description:
A remastered version of Burari Sekai Untei.

Travel around the world by moving through the mountains that surround the earth!
Endless one-touch action is now available in deluxe form!

The running bar may be missing or someone walking on it may step on it, so use double jumps and single jumps to avoid it.
The goal is to circumnavigate the globe, but the game continues even after achieving the goal until you make a mistake, so how many times can you circumnavigate the globe? Let's try it!

2015/12 New mode “Bralympics” released!

Note: This work is a renewed version of "Burari World Untei" which was distributed until June 2015.

Both of you must make it out alive - if either of you dies, you must restart. Defend her with the limited provisions you get, and escort her to the exit gate!

Drop marbles into the container - if two marbles of the same size touch each other, then they merge together to form a single larger marble, and you get some points (larger merges have larger value). If a marble comes to rest while going past the top of the container, you lose!

name: Final Fantasy XVI: Collector's Edition
description:
Final Fantasy XVI is the first fully fledged action RPG in the mainline Final Fantasy series. Clive Rosfield is on a mission to free mankind from its fate, and must use the Eikonic powers at his disposal to overcome every obstacle his enemies lay before him.

Collector's Edition in-game item
Bonus Weapon: Blood Sword
The fabled scarlet steel of Firion, hero of Final Fantasy II.

Collector's Edition bonus digital contents
Digital Mini Artbook, Digital Mini Soundtrack
These digital contents allows you to enjoy the world of "FINAL FANTASY XVI" to your heart's content.

Collector's Edition bonus physical contents
Premium Statue - Phoenix vs Ifrit
A premium statue depicting a battle between two eikons - Phoenix and Ifrit.
Approx. size: W230mm x D150mm x H270mm
Material: PVC, ABS

Metal Eikon Pin Collection
A premium metal pin collection featuring eight eikons.
Approx. size: W33mm x D5mm x H35mm (Ifrit)
Material: Zinc Alloy, Brass

Special Clive Rosfield SteelBook Case
A SteelBook case featuring artwork of Clive Rosfield, the protagonist. Use the case to store the disc-based media of your choice.
Material: Tin, Polypropylene

Cloth World Map of Valisthea
A cloth map of Valisthea where the story unfolds.
Approx. size: W615mm x D350mm, Thickness 0.3mm
Material: 100% Cotton

Have you ever wondered about what lies in the dark?
Have you ever thought about the mysteries that belong in the darkness and the shadows?
Well if you have I don't have the answer for that, but in "Run from the Light" you become one with the shadows, only to come across light spots falling from the sky! Don't let them touch you, otherwise, the darkness will not be happy and absorb you entirely.

description: The objective of the game is to rescue the princess who has been kidnapped by monsters. You have to defeat the monsters that live in the dungeon and reach the room where the princess is trapped.

name: Héchéng Dà Xīguā
description: Synthetic Big Watermelon is a Chinese web browser game developed by Micro Umbrella Games that went viral on WeChat. It originated the concept which was later used in the very popular "Suika Game" and inspiring many games like it.

name: One Piece: Pirate Warriors 4 - Zorojuro Costume
description: Sin descripción

name: One Piece: Pirate Warriors 4 - Soba Mask Costume
description: Sin descripción

name: Mortal Kombat X: Cosplay Pack
description: Two new character skins. The Cosplay Pack reimagines Mortal Kombat X characters Cassie Cage and Jacqui Briggs as Lin Kuei and Shirai Ryu Ninjas.

name: Mortal Kombat 11: Masquerade Skin Pack
description: The Masquerade Skin Pack includes three new character skins, just in time for Halloween. Play as Wicked Witch Jade, Psyko Killer Kabal and Calavera Liu Kang.

name: Sonic Overture '95
description:
Sonic Overture '95 is a fan-made prequel to the first Sonic the Hedgehog, inspired by 32-bit games from the Saturn era and the scraped concepts from the original Sonic the Hedgehog. It tells the story of Sonic's adventures on Christmas Island.

The game is an unofficial revival of the game known as Sonic Overture, which had a demo released in 2014.

name: Ninja Jajamaru-kun Ranbu
description:
Jaleco's popular action game "Ninja Jajamarukun" has been released as a 505 exclusive app. Moreover, it is released as a completely original new work.
Jajamaru-kun will fight the monsters that come his way, using jumps, shuriken, and items on stages themed around the four seasons of spring, summer, fall, and winter. This game adds new actions such as dash, triangle jump, and tackle. Also, the effects of items will become more powerful as you fill up the special move gauge!
In the previous game, you could only destroy blocks above your head, but now you can also destroy blocks above, below, left and right. Also pay attention to the big characters that appear at key points!

"Ninja Jajamaru-kun Ranbu", which is currently being distributed as a 505 series exclusive application, has started distribution in response to the enthusiastic voices of users who said, "I want to play it on 504 as well!" Use shuriken, jumps, and items to shoot down the monsters lined up. Of course, the 504 series will also feature new actions such as dash and triangle jump!

name: Interlocked
description: 'Interlocked' is a 2011 Flash/browser game containing 20 puzzles, consisting predominantly of interlocked wooden pieces you need to disentangle. This game would later be ported and expanded upon in the 2012 mobile port of the same name.

name: Cards of Heart
description: Cards of Heart is a narrative-focused cozy digital card game mixed with a fantasy top-down RPG about a young woman’s daily mental health struggles against her inner Shadows.

name: Aladdin Magic Carpet Racing
description:
"Aladdin Magic Carpet Racing" is an exhilarating, fast-paced racing game set against the enchanting backdrop of Agrabah. Players can choose to race as either Aladdin or Princess Jasmine, navigating their way through four uniquely designed and challenging race courses. The game’s vibrant visuals and dynamic tracks capture the essence of the magical world, offering an immersive racing experience.

In each race, players will dodge obstacles, collect power-ups, and outmaneuver opponents to gain the lead. The courses are filled with iconic locations from the Aladdin universe, providing a nostalgic yet thrilling adventure. The ultimate goal is to defeat the evil sorcerer Jafar in the final showdown to win the prestigious Agrabah Cup and become the reigning magic carpet racing champion.

name: MLB Live Challenge
description: The Major League Baseball season continues! Build your own baseball team in MLB Live Challenge, your connection to real Major League baseball! Collect player tickets featuring real-life pros from all 30 Major League teams, and test your lineup against real-world MLB game results, updated every day! Upgrade your players, manage your roster and create the ultimate lineup in MLB Live Challenge!
